text:
It seems that Ant's XSLT task does not report an error when it is used
with the "in" attribute and the file specified with the "in" attribute
does not exist.
creator: dsb@smart.net

text:
Thanks for the bug report, this is now fixed in CVS, the build will now fail 
with an explicit error message if there is no input file for the style task.
Antoine
creator: antoine@apache.org
